column5: ~~~~Had some trouble with my Maxxum 101 Trolling motor no power past the foot controls, was having a great day on Canal, then nothing, bats were fully charged when we started. Bud and I did some trouble shooting had power up the the speed control curuit board then nothing, contacted Min Kota the part I belive I needed was $200.They suggested I take it to an Authorized dealer ,Boat Tech in Pickering, which I did, and got if fix for under $60.Now to get the crack welded and lookie out Phishies
